creator: wang.haifeng@cerbibo.com
text:
Filename for commons-logging-api in 5.5.26 had been changed from "commons-logging-api.jar" to "commons-logging-api-1.1.1.jar", but config files such as catalina-tasks.xml is continue using old filename.

This change also make our production fail to running.
A patch has been proposed for the next release.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: This has been fixed in svn and will be included in the next release.
